CustomField.formula: CASE(TEXT( FundingDisbursement.FundingAward.Status ), "Approved Pending GA", "Actual", "Awarded","Actual", "Active Grant", "Actual", "Grant Closed","Actual", "Grant Closed Unsatisfactorily","Actual", 'Planning', 'Projected', 'Application Invited', 'Projected', 'Under Review', 'Projected', 'Reopened', 'Projected', 'Program Review', 'Projected', 'Director Review', 'Projected', 'Compliance', 'Projected', 'VP Review', 'Projected', 'PC Review', 'Projected','Rejected')
CustomField.label: Active Grant
